properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA including the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 17 at 6:56AM EST until January 17 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt,
diminishing to 15 to 20 kt, and waves 3 to 5 ft expected.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA
including the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel.

* WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 AM EST THIS MORNING
